title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

EIB anchor baby, Mark Steyn, filled in for Rush on Tuesday. Biden’s dog mishap. President-elect is a stupid title. Mathematician Bobby Piton gets banned by Big Social as Twitter shuts him down during testimony on voter fraud. Chinese definitions of free speech. Lin Wood breaking news! Goldfinger is right: Third time is criminal action. Dominion server crash during recount in Fulton County, GA. The burst-pipe lie. Trump isn’t the only victim of a stolen election. Rally should focus on the heist. Biden’s corrupt business ties. Caller challenges Steyn on mail-in voting. 

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

CA election and outdoor-dining hypocrites. Big Gov doesn’t work: Four million in fraudulent unemployment benefits. Ruling class, fraud class, and the rest of us, the working class. Caller asks whatever happened to the Barr/Durham report. Steyn describes being interviewed by Rush. Hey, Biden: Trump had a female communications team, too. There should be protests against the legitimacy of this election. People who tweet under a pseudonym are ninnies. Caller bemoans media: Don’t spit in my face and tell me it’s raining. NV vote buying.  

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Defend the Majority rally in Savannah. Election integrity has to mean something. Dominion employee caught on camera. Australian PM demands apology from Chinese gov’t for doctored image of solider murdering child: Twitter refuses to remove image. Caller maintains that mail-in voting is a disaster. Criminal conspiracy to steal the vote. Katy Perry is being cancelled for supporting her dad’s nonpartisan t-shirt line. Staten Island bar refuses to close. Japan suicide crisis. Sex bans.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
